title: List of all Android codec  libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Android codec  libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: WhatTheCodec
repoList.description: A sample app that uses FFmpeg's shared libraries

repoList.name: Codec
repoList.description: Android encoding and decoding library by c

repoList.name: uia-message
repoList.description: A Java serialization/deserialization library to convert Objects into binary and back depending on structure defined by XML.

repoList.name: SharedLibrary
repoList.description: shared libararies for android develop, contains common UI library such as common control and data model, media library such as codec and live broad cast.

repoList.name: AgpTransformApiBase64
repoList.description: Example of using Android Gradle Plugin's Transform API to rewrite a jar dependency to avoid a NoSuchMethodException caused by an old copy of the apache commons codec library existing on the Android system class path
